properties.title: SysML - Tools Generation Standard Operating Procedure

section.name: Pre-requisit
section.p: Have your profile myprofile.profile.uml, in our case SysML16.profile.uml
Have a Papyrus instance with UML2Extension and Developer tools installed

section.name: Step 1: generation of model,edit plugins code

subsection.name: 1.0: Purpose
subsection.p: Generate the "static profile" (the java code related to the UML profile)

subsection.name: 1.1: Create the EMF generator Model
subsection.p: right-click on the profile, select new EMF Generator Model

subsection.name: 1.2: Generate the code

ul.li: switch the default output directory from src to src-gen
for the EditPluginClass remove intermediate package name, to reflect .provider.SysmlEditPlugin

subsection.p: Right click generate Model and Edit code

subsection.name: 1.x: Validation
subsection.p: Code should compile at this step

section.name: Step 2: generation of ElementType configuration files

subsection.name: 2.0: Purpose
subsection.p: Generate semantic and diagramatics elementtypes related to the profile

subsection.name: 2.1: Semantic Elementtypeconfiguration
subsection.p: Move it to the right plugin place

subsection.name: 2.1: UI Elementtypeconfiguration
subsection.p: Move it to the common plugin place and do it foreach root diagrams

section.name: Step 3: generation of New Child Menu

subsection.name: 3.0: Purpose
subsection.p: Generate the new child menu present in the model explorer

subsection.name: 4.0: Purpose
subsection.p: Generate the default property views (one context .ctx file and multiple xwt files)

subsection.name: 4.x: Validation
subsection.p: Should generate one *.ctx file and many *.xwt files

subsection.name: 5.0: Purpose
subsection.p: Generate the tooling to have assistants in customized diagrams
